contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of February 2006, we hereby GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, REVERSE the Order of the Superior Court, and REMAND this matter so that the Superior Court may address the merits. See, Pa. R.A.P. 1701(b)(1).
Justice BAER did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
